item.title: It's Pink Cell Phone Season Again
item.description: Valentine’s Day kicks off the season for pink cell phones, a trend that lasts until Mother’s Day. This convergence of technology and pink offers a stylish option for yourself or your significant other. This year, the Samsung Instinct Pink for Sprint PCS is a top pick. Though usually a pricey phone, it’s available at a significant discount with an Everything Plan or Talk/Message/Data Share Plan from Sprint PCS. Families can even get two discounted phones with the right family plan.
